text: 🚨 Russia-Ukraine War: Day 783 Update 🚨🌎 Key Developments:1️⃣ Russian forces launched a large-scale offensive in eastern Ukraine, targeting several cities and towns.2️⃣ Ukrainian officials reported heavy shelling and aerial bombardments in multiple regions, including Donetsk and Luhansk.3️⃣ The situation in Mariupol remains critical, with ongoing fighting and humanitarian concerns.4️⃣ Ukraine's President Zelenskyy accused Russia of "brutal aggression" and called for international support.5️⃣ Russia's Foreign Ministry spokesperson denied any involvement in the conflict, blaming Ukraine for the escalation.6️⃣ The US and EU issued statements condemning Russia's actions and pledging support for Ukraine.7️⃣ The UN Security Council is set to hold an emergency meeting to discuss the situation.💡 Stay informed, stay safe. Let's work together towards peace and diplomacy. #RussiaUkraineWar #PeaceTalks # Diplomacy
